programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Payment days sure to be a spicy affair this time around, with high emotions, awkward exchanges and plenty of pernickety comments to unpick.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Simon White and friend and neighbour Shirley Boyle are first to host at The Old Hall Country House in the picturesque village of Madeley in Cheshire. On arrival most of the guests are awed by the historical 16th century BandB. In the afternoon, Simon and Shirley take their guests tap dancing and in keeping with the five-star luxury to a private fine dining restaurant for dinner.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Its day two in the competition and the turn of cat-lover Eileen Finn to cater for her BandB competitors at the four-star Thornley House in Allendale, Northumbria. After being blown away by first hosts Simon and Shirley at the luxury Old Hall Country House, Eileen has her work cut out. Also, Eileens beloved and very large Maine Coon cats are not to all of her guests liking.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Jessica and Adrian Rashleigh are third to host at their three bedroom establishment Chy Conyn in St Ives, on the beautiful Cornish coast. The hosts hope that what they lack for in size they will make up for in stunning surroundings. For the activity Jessica and Adrian take their guests on a magical mystery camper van tour of the local sights. At breakfast some of the guests struggle with the small breakfast room.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final hosts are Tim and Karen from The Cavendish in Bournemouth. The guests are initially impressed with the 16-bed `pink palace, but things go downhill when Simon and Shirley vigorously test their bed - and break it. Jessica and Adrian are worried that their room, situated right next to the front door, may mean a noisy night. Eileen however is delighted by the feline memorabilia left in her room as a special touch.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The rivals reconvene for one last time to find out how much theyve been paid by their fellow BandB owners, and to sort out their differences. Simon White of Old Hall Country House is stunned by a generous overpayment, but Eileen Finn from the four-star Thornley is on the receiving end of some harsh criticism and some even harsher payments, and a shock underpayment leaves Tim from The Cavendish in Bournemouth reeling.

programme.title: Location, Location, Location

programme.desc: A feast of show-stopping highlights from the biggest classical music festival in the world. From Mendelssohn to Mahler, Vaughan Williams to Vivaldi, Star Wars to Shostakovich: theres something for everyone in this musical mix tape of the season.

programme.title: Jessye Norman at the BBC
programme.desc: A superb compilation celebrating the artistry of one of the great sopranos of the 20th century, Jessye Norman, tracing her remarkable journey from spirituals and traditional folk songs to her landmark debut at the London Proms. Featuring interviews with the star across the decades, this programme showcases the extraordinary breadth of her repertoire, from American Songbook favourites to the grandeur of Mahlers song cycles.

programme.title: Jessye Norman and the Spiritual
programme.desc: Celebrated soprano Jessye Norman presents a concert in speech and song in which she performs a moving selection of spiritual songs and explains their background and historical significance. She is accompanied by pianist Philip Moll and the Ambrosian Singers, conducted by Willis Patterson.

programme.title: Arena
programme.desc: Rivers are the wondrous sculptors of the elaborate landscapes found on planet earth. They wear away mighty mountains, scour rock faces, carve deep valleys, create fertile plains, and then decorate them with their meanderings. For eons, running water obeyed only its own laws. To be truly alive, a river must be wild: wilful and unhindered. Yearning for the ocean, its only purpose is to descend. In many places, rivers are seen as a source of great hope and something to be worshipped.

programme.title: Buddha: Genius of the Ancient World
programme.desc: Bettany Hughes investigates the revolutionary ideas of the Buddha.

programme.title: The Story of Welsh Art
programme.desc: Huw starts his journey on the island of Anglesey where he steps inside a prehistoric burial chamber to witness Welsh art in its earliest form. He sees an exquisite example of Bronze Age artistry in the form of a gold cape, found by chance in a field in North Wales and now one of the prize exhibits in the British Museum.

programme.title: Jessye Norman at the BBC

programme.desc: Coverage continues of the evening session of day two of the World Athletics Championships, with five gold medals on offer. Then, the fastest man and woman in the world will be crowned, with the finals of the 100m finishing off the second days action.

programme.title: Morning Live
programme.desc: Join Gethin Jones, Helen Skelton, Michelle Ackerley and the team for conversation, advice and tips to make your day that little bit easier.

programme.title: The Moment of Proof
programme.desc: A man is conclusively linked to a series of murders at music venues by a shoelace with traces of his final victims DNA on it. After two people are set upon at a music festival by attackers with the same description, police are in a race against time to find their man, but then a third assault at a nightclub leaves them a vital clue. Also today, coded information buried within a spreadsheet reveals the man responsible for a campaign of hacking and blackmailing that targeted businesses.

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Jacqui visits Broadstairs in Kent, a favourite holiday destination of Charles Dickens, to see a two-bedroom basement garden flat bought by an experienced developer. Martin returns to Burton-on-Trent in Staffordshire to revisit a fire-damaged two-bed terrace he first saw in 2021, and he also heads to Tonypandy in south Wales to visit a four-storey building with potential to convert into separate flats.

programme.title: WA World Championship Athletics LIVE
programme.desc: Coverage continues on day three of the World Athletics Championships in Tokyo, with the focus turning to Mondo Duplantis in the final of the mens pole vault. Hes already broken his own world record three times this season, and hes aiming for a third world title in Japan. The mens sprint hurdlers begin their campaigns for gold as well in the heats of the 110m hurdles. Can the USAs Grant Holloway defend his title despite a tricky season so far?

programme.desc: A couple with four children searches for outdoor adventures and fresh air in North Yorkshire, where Briony May Williams helps them find a family home with room to spread their wings.

programme.title: The Travelling Auctioneers
programme.desc: Izzie and Saf clear a bungalow of quirky collectibles, including an Egyptian sarcophagus and a suffragette mannequin. However, they lose track of time during a cuckoo clock fix.

programme.title: The Answer Run
programme.desc: Three couples face a series of 50/50 questions which hurtle The Answer Run down towards them. Across three rounds, the couples build up their cash pots, but only one pair can face The Final Run and win the chance to take home their cash prize.

programme.title: Pointless
programme.desc: Alexander Armstrong is joined by co-host Stephen Mangan. As always, contestants try to score as few points as possible by plumbing the depths of their general knowledge to come up with the answers no-one else could think of.

programme.title: WA World Athletics Championships
programme.desc: The worlds fastest men and women in the world are on the track as Sarah Mulkerrins presents highlights of a busy second day of the World Athletics Championships from Tokyo. Its the finals of both the men and womens 100m, with Noah Lyles, Julien Alfred, Dina Asher-Smith and Zharnel Hughes all aiming for a place on the podium. Three other world champions will be crowned in the mens 10,000m, the womens discus and the womens long jump, and well reflect on the womens marathon.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.sub-title: Animated Specials: Gruesome Guide to Growing Up
programme.desc: Horrible Histories delves into the not-so-easy lives of children throughout history, from the strict parenting of ancient civilisations, to the terrible fights the young King Louis XIV had with his little brother.

programme.title: Early Man
programme.desc: A plucky cave man and the rest of his tribe face a grave threat when Lord Nooth plans to transform their land into a giant mine. Not ready to go down without a fight, he must unite the clan in an epic quest to defeat a mighty enemy: the Bronze Age.

programme.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island
programme.desc: The time comes for one couple to flare out of Honeymoon Island, signalling the end of their relationship. Elsewhere, the couples swap partners for the day to gain some valuable insights into their marriages, resulting in some fiery exchanges on their return.

programme.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island
programme.desc: An intimacy crate washes up to help the honeymooners get personal. And when the couples spend the day apart at beach picnics, some are left reeling from shocking revelations, before a brand-new couple jump into stranded life together.

programme.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island
programme.desc: A crate containing the couples mobile phones washes ashore, revealing more than anyone bargained for. David drops a bombshell to Ini, causing shockwaves at the Couples Cove. And when night falls, Film Fest serves up some even bigger surprises for the honeymooners.

programme.title: Thailand: The Dark Side of Paradise
programme.desc: After being invited to a bar crawl on Khaosan Road, Zara gets under the skin of Bangkoks notorious red light district, Soi Cowboy - but filming is swiftly shut down by local bar owners and the police. When Zara meets Mike Yu, a young British expat living a life of luxury in the Thai capital, she realises theres more to the city than meets the eye. Meanwhile, a visit to the Bangkok Immigration Detention Centre exposes how easy it is to get caught on the wrong side of the law in Thailand.

programme.title: Thailand: The Dark Side of Paradise
programme.desc: In Asias sex capital, Pattaya, Zara meets British men chasing cheap thrills, before heading to Ko Phangan, an exotic island famed for its spirituality and beauty.

programme.title: Thailand: The Dark Side of Paradise
programme.desc: After a wild and crazy night at Ko Phangans Full Moon Party, Zara travels to Phuket and experiences a taste of Thailands luxury lifestyle.

programme.title: Angels of the North
programme.sub-title: Big Tyne: I cannae cos the child locks on
programme.desc: Sammyjo enlists the Longlox girls help as she makes plans for her and Garys first anniversary. Meanwhile, piercer Carmen wants to pierce below the waist.

programme.title: Two Pints of Lager and a Packet of Crisps
programme.desc: Jonny gets a job and a sexy offer he cant refuse, Gaz and Donna are up all night for the wrong reasons, and David shows Louise a new way to cope with growing old.

programme.title: Ibiza: Secrets of the Party Island
programme.desc: With access to luxury clubs, yachts and villas, as well as police, undercover detectives and emergency medics, Zara McDermott discovers the secrets of the unique Spanish island of Ibiza.

programme.title: This Is BBC TWO
programme.desc: Preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

programme.title: Take a Hike
programme.desc: The weeks walks take place in stunning north west Wales. Four million people visit the region each year to enjoy its beautiful lakes and coastlines, as well as the challenging Snowdonia mountain range.

programme.title: Countryfile
programme.desc: Matt Baker and Sammi Kinghorn trace the pawprints of a river legend - Tarka the Otter, to explore how the people of North Devon have helped the Eurasian otter claw back from near-extinction.

programme.title: Breakfast
programme.desc: The BBCs Breakfast programme features the latest news, sport, business, weather and other items on a daily basis.

programme.title: Beechgrove Garden
programme.desc: At Beechgrove Garden, Lizzie and Brian return to the project of creating a new garden in memory of presenter Jim McColl, who passed away last year. Jims favourite trees, acers, are being planted.

programme.title: Hairy Bikers Best of British
programme.desc: Dave and Si explore how our love affair with bread has evolved over centuries. With their unique banter and camaraderie, they try their hand at Bagel making; create their own version of Summer Pudding and make a delicious soup and roll combo.

programme.title: WA World Championship Athletics LIVE
programme.desc: Five world champions are crowned on the second day of the World Athletics Championships from Tokyo as the fastest men and women in the world take to the track. After winning Olympic silver in Paris 2024, Matthew Hudson-Smith starts his campaign for a first world title as he lines up in the heats of the mens 400 metres. Great Britains world indoor champion Amber Anning is in action in qualifying for the womens 400m.

programme.title: Womens Rugby World Cup LIVE
programme.desc: Coverage of the third quarter-final of the Womens Rugby World Cup 2025.

programme.title: Brief Encounter
programme.desc: Housewife Laura Jesson meets Dr Alec Harvey at a railway station cafe and there is a spark. While both are married, they are tempted to adultery before they realise their marriages are more important than the fleeting happiness they may find together.

programme.title: The Wonder of Animals
programme.desc: Chris Packham explores what enables birds of prey to rule the aerial roost. Their ability to dominate their fellow birds in terms of strength, manoeuvrability and speed, is down to a combination of anatomical and physiological adaptations.

programme.title: The Great British Sewing Bee
programme.desc: Its the semi-final of the Great British Sewing Bee, and three challenges stand between the sewers and the final: plus fours, polo shirts and 1920s-inspired party outfits.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: The team presents from Culzean Castle on the west coast of Scotland. Experts Anita Manning and Natasha Raskin Sharp are on hand to find a selection of objects to take to auction. A watercolour with a local connection catches Anita?s eye, while Natasha is drawn to a gorgeous handwoven blanket. Paul Martin explores a hidden part of Culzean?s history, uncovering the tales of smugglers working the coastline in the caves beneath the castle walls.

programme.title: Saving Lives at Sea
programme.desc: A frantic mother alerts the lifeguards after six teenagers are cut off by the tide. The Anstruther crew race to the rescue of a female paddleboarder. The reports of a clothed person entering the water lead the Selsey crew to a late-night search.

programme.title: Rob and Rylans Passage to India
programme.desc: In Delhi, Rob and Rylan discover a tomb with a view, encounter a billionaire art collector, attempt their own rap performance, and try the ancient art of puppetry.

programme.title: Tár
programme.desc: Renowned musician Lydia Tár is days away from recording the symphony that will elevate her career. When all elements seem to conspire against her, Lydias adopted daughter Petra becomes an integral emotional support for her struggling mother.

programme.title: International T20 Cricket
programme.desc: Highlights of the third game of the T20 series between England and South Africa.

programme.title: The Guest
programme.desc: Ria faces the police while trying to pick up the pieces with Lee. But that will mean cutting Fran off entirely. Can she ever go back to her old life?

programme.title: Here We Go
programme.desc: Paul is going to be Altas godfather, but only if he gets himself baptised first.

programme.title: Chess Masters: The Endgame
programme.desc: The four finalists return for the last time to the Great Hall, ready to be put through their chess-playing paces like never before. Who will lift the winners trophy?

programme.title: Panorama
programme.desc: Current affairs programme, featuring interviews and investigative reports on all aspects of life in Britain.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: On the final leg of his Midlands tour, Michael Portillo travels to Solihull, the home of iconic British brand Land Rover. Later, he visits the childhood neighbourhood of JRR Tolkien.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo embarks on a journey across Essex. He heads to the ancient woodland of Epping Forest and learns of Audley End Houses role as a secret wartime military school.

programme.title: This Is BBC TWO
programme.desc: Preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

programme.title: The Travelling Auctioneers
programme.desc: JB stumbles upon a rare and valuable book collection, and JJ restores a treasured washstand. But one wrong blow with a hammer could damage a cherished piece beyond repair.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The roadshow travels to Beaumaris Castle on the island of Anglesey, north Wales, where jewellery expert Joanna Hardy is dazzled by a rare ruby and diamond collection worn by a family for generations of weddings. Lisa Lloyd is fascinated by a wooden figurine hidden in a secret cupboard and identifies it as a ceremonial African puppet. Ben Rogers Jones sees a collection of photographs and ephemera relating to one of Waless most important historical figures, Prime Minister David Lloyd George.

programme.title: Match of the Day
programme.desc: Kelly Cates presents highlights from both of Sundays Premier League games, including an early-season Manchester derby. Liverpool look to maintain their 100 per cent record when they take on Burnley at Turf Moor, and there are some crackers to choose from in Augusts Goal of the Month.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: Twenty-four hours a day, the latest national and international stories as they break.

programme.title: WA World Championship Athletics LIVE
programme.desc: There are four world titles on offer on day three of the World Athletics Championships in Tokyo, but all eyes will be on Mondo Duplantis. The Olympic champion has already broken his own world record this season - can he do it again in the National Stadium and claim a third world title? 400m hurdle world record holder Karsten Warholm is also in action in the heats.

programme.title: Politics Live
programme.desc: Jo Coburn invites a panel of guests to share their opinions on the newsmaking stories of the day.

programme.title: WA World Championship Athletics LIVE
programme.desc: Day three of the World Athletics Championships draws to a close as Josh Kerr continues the defence of his 1500m crown. First, though, he has to get through the semi-finals. The mens pole vault concludes, and can world record holder Mondo Duplantis claim a third consecutive world title? Theres also coverage of the mens 300m steeplechase final, and the womens 100m hurdles champion is also crowned.

programme.title: Hairy Bikers Best of British
programme.desc: Dave Myers and Si King explore the amazing food available in our British Waterways. With their unique banter and camaraderie, the duo try their hand at fly fishing for trout, create a sumptuous stuffed wild duck and find out about how the Gloucestershire tradition of eating baby eels has effectively died out.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.sub-title: London and the South East England: Judging
programme.desc: The two highest scoring chefs from London and south east England must go head-to-head and cook their six-course menus again.

programme.title: Cornwall: This Fishing Life
programme.desc: Cadgwith Cove is Cornwalls last traditional full-time fishing cove. As boats got bigger, fish stocks declined and young men left, many of Cornwalls other coves faded away. Despite this, Cadgwith has held strong.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: Antique experts Catherine Southon and David Fletcher find objects to take off to auction. Catherine uncovers a large collection of glassware and stoneware which had been dug up in the north east of England and David finds an American money box in the shape of a bulldog.

programme.title: Richard Osmans House of Games
programme.desc: Every day this week, former winners Tim Key, Jamie Laing, Sunetra Sarker and Laura Whitmore take on a series of quiz rounds selected by the host, quiz legend Richard Osman.

programme.title: Great Coastal Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo sets off on a new railway adventure to explore the twin shores of the English Channel and the estuaries of the Thames and Medway. At Cuckmere Haven, he enjoys astonishing views of the gleaming white Seven Sisters.

programme.title: Global Eye
programme.desc: Jean Mackenzie reports on the political turmoil in South Korea following the short-lived declaration of martial law last year.

programme.title: Mastermind
programme.desc: Clive Myrie presents another heat of the classic quiz. The specialist subjects are the history of Coventry, the BBC comedy series `People Just Do Nothing, the Roman emperor Nero, and the life of the sportsman CB Fry.

programme.title: Only Connect
programme.desc: Victoria Coren Mitchell hosts the quiz. Two teams who lost their first-round match return, and only one of them can go through to the next round. They face such questions as, what is the connection between dis-moi, the royal, Nintendo, and pee-?

programme.title: University Challenge
programme.desc: The first round of the competition continues. Trinity Hall, Cambridge, and the London School of Economics are the teams facing their first starters for ten. Amol Rajan asks the questions.

programme.title: Twiggy
programme.desc: A portrait of International supermodel, actor, singer and iconic British figure, Twiggy.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the days top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

programme.title: BBC Weather
programme.desc: The latest weather forecast.

programme.title: The Big Cases
programme.sub-title: The Aristocrat, the Convict and the Missing Baby
programme.desc: An aristocrat and her convict partner go on the run with their newborn baby. The search ends in heartbreak. Family, friends, and witnesses reveal the background to this extraordinary case.

programme.title: Bram Stokers Dracula
programme.desc: Retelling of the classic horror tale about Count Dracula, a 15th-century prince who is condemned to live off the blood of the living for eternity. Young lawyer Jonathan Harker is sent to Draculas castle to finalise a land deal, but when the Count sees a photo of Harkers fiancee, Mina, the image of his dead wife, he imprisons him and sets off for London to track her down.

programme.title: Countryfile
programme.desc: Matt Baker and Sammi Kinghorn trace the pawprints of a river legend - Tarka the Otter, to explore how the people of North Devon have helped the Eurasian otter claw back from near-extinction.

programme.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island
programme.desc: The time comes for one couple to flare out of Honeymoon Island, signalling the end of their relationship. Elsewhere, the couples swap partners for the day to gain some valuable insights into their marriages, resulting in some fiery exchanges on their return.

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: Knockout week has arrived. Sixteen amateurs compete for the final ten places and the opportunity to tackle their first professional kitchen service.

programme.desc: Mush-Mush and his best friends Chep and Lilit have all kinds of adventures in the forest. They are the protectors of the forest and they all have a unique power.

programme.desc: Mishmosh invents a tunnel digger, causing concern that it might replace moles natural digging abilities. As Moletown faces a heatwave, Moley and Dotty hope Mishmosh can create an invention to cool the town.

Tyler takes the plunge in Plymouth to reveal how a special marine plant is being brought back from the edge of extinction to help fight climate change. Plucking up courage, he then dives deep to swim with sharks and is amazed by what he discovers about this incredible but sometimes misunderstood species.

In the final round, Bing wobbles at the last moment and Pando wins much to Bings distress - he chose the game so he thought he should win it. Fortunately, Charlie never stopped dancing.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Its vaccination day! Bing knows it might hurt a little but he is looking forward to the special shiny Hoppity Voosh sticker he will get from Doctor Molly. Bing is brave, but when he goes to get his sticker after his vaccination, he finds out that there are none left! Bing is upset- but then Pando mistakes Bings disappointment for pain, and Doctor Bing has to help.

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: Lars sees a mysterious creature near the Academy jungle and rushes to tell the others. Ubercorn explains that new species are discovered all the time, so this could be something that no one has seen before. He also tells them that new species are often named after the person who finds them. Excited by the prospect of lending their name to this mysterious creature, the Go Jetters, Grandmaster Glitch and Tala head out on a jungle expedition, but something seems to be watching them.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.sub-title: The Tale of the Amazing Mum

programme.sub-title: Octonauts and the Baby Alligator Search

programme.title: Vida the Vet

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggee gets a delivery, which arrives in a big cardboard box. programme.desc: Grandmaster Glitchs digging causes a flood in the Wieliczka Salt Mine. Can the Go Jetters save the famous salt statues?

She and her owner Katrina visit all sorts of people every day, young and old. Sylvie has a bit of a sniffle, so Katrina makes an appointment for her to see the vet. Its usually Sylvies job to help others feel calm, but now she needs to help herself. Katrina always gets worried when Sylvie is poorly, so she needs to calm Katrinas nerves.

programme.title: My World Kitchen
programme.desc: Iaia is cooking for us today and he is making a delicious stew from Guinea-Bissau called Kansiye. The dish is made with lentils, although not all of his friends are sure about the taste and smell of them when they try them before the meal. Lets hope Iaias cooked recipe, served with rice and carrots, changes their minds. Before serving, Iaia puts a vase of olive branches on his table, as these are a symbol of Guinea-Bissau.

programme.desc: Duggees Clubhouse is a bit like Cubs or Scouts, but for pre-school children. Its run by a big dog called Duggee - who is a cross between a nursery school teacher and a brown dog.

programme.desc: Captain Barnacles and his intrepid band of explorers roam the oceans in search of adventure and fun. When all the Gups go out of control, Barnacles and Kwazii leap onto the backs of some speedy sailfish to round them up.

programme.title: Vida the Vet
programme.desc: Tidbit sprains his ankles before performing, so Fergie teaches him wheelchair dance moves.

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: Glitch enlists the help of a sceptical Foz and a friendly yak in order to find a yeti in the Himalayas. But when a snowstorm traps them in a cave on the mountainside, the rest of the Go Jetters must battle the elements to find their friends.

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: Glitchs plans to open a hotel on an unspoilt beach in Thailand go wrong when macaque monkeys steal his Grim-o-freeze gun. It doesnt take long for the trouble to spread across Monkey Bay, so the Go Jetters leap into action to help save the beach.

programme.title: Educating Yorkshire
programme.desc: This documentary takes viewers inside the doors of Thornhill Community Academy near Dewsbury, highlighting what happens in the secondary school. Through highlighting the diverse institution, almost exactly half White British and half British-Asian, `Educating Yorkshire provides an insight into modern school life in the UK as it follows head teacher Jonny Mitchell, who tries to build upon recent improvements in exam results among the schools students. The programme also explores the universal themes of teenage life and the student-teacher relationships that are important in a young persons formative years.

programme.title: The Inheritance

programme.desc: Bradley and Barney Walsh continue their European adventure in Germany. programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. programme.desc: Gordon travels to Pasadena, California to visit a Jamaican restaurant called Cafe Kingston. There, Gordon finds Dr Una Morris, a micro-managing owner who also works as a radiotherapist in a clinic next door to the restaurant. She is determined to use hospital techniques in her kitchen and is constantly sealing everything into plastic bags. Dr Morris is as stubborn as she is proud. Can Gordon help?

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: When Stephen Hawking comes to lecture at the university for a week, Wolowitz is given the task of maintaining his wheelchair, making Sheldon green with envy. When Sheldon begs Wolowitz to introduce him to his hero Hawking, Wolowitz takes full advantage and only agrees after making Sheldon carry out a series of humiliating tasks, including doing his laundry, cleaning his room, and taking his mother dress shopping.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard, Sheldon and Koothrappali throw a classy bachelor party for Wolowitz, during which some stories about the future bridegrooms colourful sexual history are accidentally revealed. When Bernadette hears about it, she becomes upset and threatens to call off the wedding. Can Wolowitz win her over with a convincing explanation and a heartfelt apology to get the nuptials back on track?

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard gets caught in an argument between his mum and Bernadette while at the International Space Station. Meanwhile, Ray is feeling lonely so Sheldon invites him along to his second anniversary date with Amy.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives

programme.title: Man v Food

programme.title: Man v Food

programme.title: Man v Food
programme.desc: Casey Webb heads to Pittsburgh for a five-pound sandwich loaded with meat, cheese, fries, and coleslaw.

programme.title: Man v Food

programme.desc: Jamie rustles up a quick crispy breaded chicken for the family and he shows how to transform a burger by using sweet potato in two new ways.

programme.title: Jamies Easy Meals for Every Day
programme.desc: Jamie cooks up a baked casserole and he shows a way to dress an aubergine salad, served with the quickest homemade flatbreads.

programme.title: James Martins Great British Adventure
programme.desc: James and Stephen head south through Wales en route to Pembrokeshire. But before they get there, they stop to visit Gareth Ward and his stunning restaurant Ynyshir. After filling their bellies, they make it to the coast where James cooks up his Marloes Sands seafood parcel. Stephen tracks down Wales answer to Willy Wonka, young chocolatier Liam Burgess, who helps him make a very special one-off-chocolate bar for James.

programme.title: James Martins Great British Adventure
programme.desc: James British adventure has crossed over the Irish sea to Northern Ireland, where he is joined by his great pal and famous local chef, Paul Rankin. Their first port of call is the Giants Causeway, where James settles right in and cooks up a fish stew for the crowds of tourists. Paul goes in search of Irish gold and finds it in the form of rapeseed at the Kane family farm in Limavady.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: The contestants bake rye bread rolls, ciabatta loaves and a filled centrepiece loaf that must make an impact on the table as well as on the judges.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: The bakers cook saucy puds filled with a gooey filling, Marys tiramisu cake and a showstopping baked Alaska made of cake, meringue and ice cream.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: The contestants bake sweet custard tarts, mini pear pies and finally a towering collection of pies from any pastry or pastries they like.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: The bakers prepare yeast-leavened cakes, a Swedish princess torte and a contemporary version of the Dobos Torte. Whose `Bake Off will come to a sweet but sticky end?

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: The bakers make signature savoury parcels, kouign amann and two types of showstopping doughnuts, which they hope will secure them a place in the quarter-finals.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Its the quarter-finals and the remaining five are tasked with baking enriched sweet fruit loaves, an Eastern European cross between a bread and a pastry, and 36 showstopping doughnuts.

programme.title: James Martins Islands to Highlands
programme.desc: James is joined by Galton Blackiston, his pal and a top-class, Michelin-starred chef. They don diving suits to swim with seals, and hire an unusual mode of transport to take them around the islands. Galton visits a sea salt farm and delivers some back to James, who uses it to cook up some wonderful salt-baked sea bass. James finds an unusual restaurant situated in the middle of a post office, and finishes off the day cooking roast duck by a stunning seashore.

programme.title: James Martins Islands to Highlands
programme.desc: James returns to one of his favourite places in the UK: the beautiful county of Cornwall. Joining him is his close pal and Michelin-starred chef Galton Blackiston. During their trip they discover some world-class Cornish ice cream, and Galton visits Newlyn fish market to pick up some Cornish cod. James cooks the cod along with Cornish oysters and a warm tartare sauce. They both round off the day with a painting challenge on Sennen beach, where they try out their oil painting skills.

programme.title: James Martins Islands to Highlands
programme.desc: On the next leg of his UK tour, James is joined in glorious Devon by his friend and Michelin-starred chef Simon Hulstone. James visits an extraordinary mushroom farm situated in a bungalow, and makes a tasty steak and mushroom dish. Simon samples some award-winning cheese, which inspires James to make a cheese platter fit for a king. The day ends with a trip to the Art Deco splendour of Burgh Island.

programme.title: James Martins Islands to Highlands
programme.desc: James is joined by pal and Michelin-starred chef Mark Jordan, and together they set out to explore the delights of Jersey aboard mini motor bikes. James samples the delights of one of Jerseys most famous exports, the Jersey Royal potato, and he uses them to cook up a squid risotto with a difference. Mark Jordan gets a lesson in oyster shucking, and James discovers an island speciality: Jersey black butter, which he uses to create a delicious sweet treat.

Oh, and raising their first child. Now the original girls - hence, the `OG in the revived series title - return to reveal the challenges of raising children on camera, and how life in the public eye has shaped them as parents and people. Before Barbara asked the `Long Lost Family team to find him, he had never met a single blood relative and his unhappy childhood meant he had no desire to learn about his past.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Another British couple decide to swap the grey skies of Britain for sun, sea and sand abroad.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Danni Menzies shows John and Julie from Cheshire five properties for their budget of £120,000 in the beautiful region of southern Alicante, Spain. Will any of them steal their hearts?

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: With retirement on the horizon for Jeanette and Ian, they feel its the right time to make their dream come true of owning a holiday home on Spains popular Mar Menor.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: With a budget of £70,000 Ben Hillman delivers five fantastic properties on Spains popular southern Costa Blanca for Jacqui to find her dream holiday home to share with husband Adrian.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Joselyn Turner was born profoundly deaf and put in a childrens home at only two weeks old. She knows that her birth mother also had a son and is now searching for her older brother James for answers to her lifelong questions. In turn, James has also been searching for the father he never knew, and after 73 years, James finds more family than he bargained for.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell present the documentary series which aims to reunite family members after years of separation and which offers a lifeline for people who are desperate to find long-lost relatives.

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper
programme.desc: Terrys nose growth has prevented him from meeting his grandkids. Remi has alligator-like skin and is not used to taking care of herself. Austin has an embarrassing birthmark right next to his eyelid. Mary Jo has a throbbing bump on her neck.

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper
programme.desc: Kelly has a massive shoulder growth; Erica stabbed her hand with a pencil 45 years ago and believes the lead remains trapped in her palm; Paulas painful and swollen feet ooze a substance that emits the foulest of odours.

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper
programme.desc: Tony has large growths on his nose that impair his breathing and hopes Dr. Lee can help. And, Marie has an unsightly lump on her forehead that makes her a hermit.

programme.title: Help! My House Is Haunted
programme.desc: Desperate Stefan needs help proving his Elizabethan farmhouse is filled with spirits of the past. The houses checkered history is uncovered, leading the investigators to find a heartbreaking story of illegitimacy.

programme.title: Help! My House Is Haunted
programme.desc: A brutal double murder, spiritually charged ley lines, and an ancient Druid ritual site spell disaster at a notoriously haunted home in County Donegal, Ireland.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Celebrity Fantasy Homes
programme.desc: Celebrities hunt for a new home. Gaby Roslin helps find Boyzone Band member Shane Lynch a slice of country life in Kent for £1.5 million.

programme.title: Celebrity Fantasy Homes
programme.desc: Gaby Roslin helps actress Michelle Collins find her perfect home in North Londons exclusive Highgate Village for £1.5 million.

programme.title: Fantasy Homes by the Sea
programme.desc: Londoners Jess and Brian have had enough of the big smoke and want to move to the seaside to start a family. Theyve decided to look at the places on the Gower coast in south Wales and have a sizeable half-a-million pound budget.

programme.title: Cruise TV with LoveitBookit
programme.desc: A definitive one-stop shop for all things cruise, bringing you the hottest destinations and the latest deals to ensure that your next cruise ship holiday is your greatest one yet.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew Pritchard runs a decorative salvage yard and is constantly looking for new stock.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew Pritchard runs a decorative salvage yard and is constantly looking for new stock.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew Pritchard runs a decorative salvage yard and is constantly looking for new stock.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Jules Hudson is helping a self-confessed city-lover to break free from the big smoke and find some countryside calm where she can raise her young son. With a budget of £850,000, Gloucestershire is the chosen location, and her little sister is coming along for support.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Alistair Appleton helps a house-hunting couple find a country home with their £700,000 budget and get back to nature in Buckinghamshire. While in the area, Alistair visits an entrepreneurial snail farm which produces high-end snail caviar.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew heads to a huge antiques wholesaler in Exeter, where he finds pile upon pile of affordable gems. Next, its on to north London, to visit an emporium of curiosities.

programme.title: Money for Nothing
programme.desc: In Somerset, Sarah Moore explores Keynsham Recycling Centre, determined to save quality items from hitting the skips. A concoction of car parts are earmarked for blacksmith Kev Paxton, designer Sarah Peterson works on an abandoned upholstery project, and Sarah repurposes some old barrel rings before trying to sell the items on for a profit.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Antiquers Natasha Raskin Sharp and Steven Moore begin a Road Trip adventure, motoring through North Yorkshire and Tyne and Wear in grand style behind the wheel of a 1960s Rolls Royce. Steven flushes out a bargain while visiting the loo in one antiques shop, finding some 18th-century tea bowls hidden away by the toilet. A break from shopping sees Steven set sail to South Shields and learn about the incredible restoration of a quite remarkable lifeboat.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Auctioneer Natasha Raskin Sharp and ceramics expert Steven Moore are on a whistle-stop tour of Tyne and Wear before wandering north to Northumberland. Natasha wastes little time in the antiques shops, gambling her kitty like an 18th-century taverngoer buying some George III period gaming tokens. She ditches the 1960s Rolls Royce and sets off on a very unlikely safari to catch sight of an ancient creature that still roams the Northumberland plains.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: Angus helps Amanda and Steve clear their late parents home in Huddersfield thats full to brimming with memories and treasured things.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.sub-title: Hong Kong To A Galaxy Far Away
programme.desc: Shaun asks Angus to clear his late fathers home. Its packed with unusual items from East Asia, but some forgotten toys are the stars at auction.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Roo Irvine and Steven Moore are antiques hunting in the north east. Vintage luggage and a pill box surprise at auction, while Steven gets familiar with a Sunderland sailors story.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Steven and Roo shop their way through the north east, heading towards Yorkshire. Proud Scot Roo finds a patriotic portrait of a stag, while Geordie ceramics expert Steven plumps for a 1960s lamp of unusual origin.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: Auctioneer Angus Ashworth and his team are called out to peoples homes with a mission to sift through a lifetime of possessions and find forgotten treasures that can be sold at auction.

programme.title: Celebrity Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: Auctioneer Angus Ashworth and his team help celebrities clear their homes of clutter. Will they discover hidden gems to be auctioned off for serious profit?

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: Angus and the team are on a search for interesting items at a historic home in Coventry. Later, they travel to Aberdeenshire to collect some unusual Asian furniture for the auction house.

programme.title: Help! My House Is Haunted
programme.desc: During refurbishment of The Swan Hotel, landlords Harry and Jason found a door to a secret cellar. Opening the cellar unleashed shadow figures and a negative entity, who delights in taunting the couple by playing threatening songs on their sound system.

programme.title: Help! My House Is Haunted
programme.desc: In their most horrifying investigation yet, Ian performs exorcism to save a family in Essex. Knowing it will take everything to save them, Jayne makes a desperate plea for help from the spirits of witches she believes used to inhabit the area.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: The emergence of a powerful new villain and the return of an old friend bring Peter Parker to the realization that all his enemies have one thing in common: Oscorp. Based on Marvel Comics characters.

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: Adaptation of the adventures of the swinging comic-strip hero. A shy student becomes a crime fighter after a bite from a mutant spider, during a school outing, gives him extraordinary powers. As he comes to terms with his new-found abilities, he is also forced to contend with a maniac villain known as the Green Goblin.

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: The comic book web-slinger returns for a blockbusting sequel. Crime-fighting has cost Peter Parker his best friend and his true love Mary Jane. However, just as he quits as Spider-Man, New York comes under threat from Dr Octopus, a metal-tentacled madman. Peter has no choice but to swing back into action.

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: Life is sweet for Peter Parker, MJ loves him, her career is taking off and Spidey-mania is sweeping New York. However, when an alien parasite bonds to his suit, its not long before the good times and Spidey turn bad. While his ugly ego is taking centre stage, MJ is dumped from her Broadway show, Harry remembers Spider-Mans role in his fathers death, and Peter is consumed by revenge.

programme.title: Madame Web
programme.desc: After showing signs of clairvoyance, New York City paramedic Cassandra Webb must confront revelations about her past and protect three young women from a mysterious adversary who wants them dead.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
programme.desc: Peter Parker finds a clue that might help him understand why his parents disappeared when he was young. His path puts him on a collision course with Dr. Curt Connors, his fathers former partner.

programme.title: The Nut Job
programme.desc: After he accidentally destroys the winter food supply of his fellow Liberty Park residents, Surly, a squirrel, is banished to the streets of Oakton. Luckily, Surly finds the towns nut shop and hatches a plan to plunder its bounty. However, unbeknown to Surly and his ragtag team of animal associates, the nut shop is really a front for mobsters who plan to rob the bank next door. While Surly and his team break in to the shop, the mobsters carry out their own scheme.

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin: The Secret of the Unicorn
programme.desc: Tintin and his dog Snowy buy a model of a three-masted sailing ship `The Unicorn at a market and are immediately accosted by two people who both want to buy the model from Tintin. Tintin takes the model ship home and is later shot at and then kidnapped on board a ship with Snowy. Will they escape in time, and solve the mystery of the secret of the Unicorn?

programme.title: Happy Feet Two
programme.desc: Mumbles son Erik hasnt yet found his talents, and he goes with his friends to Adelie-land which is ruled by a penguin who can fly. When Erik returns to Emperor-land and finds them trapped under big walls of ice. Will Erik be able to save his family and friends before it is too late?

programme.title: Monsters vs Aliens
programme.desc: When an evil alien attacks the Earth, a motley crew of monsters is called into action to save the world from imminent destruction. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Concerned that his half-human grandson isnt showing his vampire side, Dracula and his friends put the boy through a `monster-in-training boot camp just as Dracs old-school father decides to pay a visit.

programme.title: Rugrats in Paris: The Movie
programme.desc: The Rugrats are in Paris where Chuckies widowed father has been called on to mend an animated monster in a theme park, but its all a ploy by Coco LaBouche - the parks head, to get appointed head of a major company. As she and her henchman Jean-Claude plan to ensnare him, only the rest of the Rugrats can stop him falling for her charms.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 4
programme.desc: When a powerful shape-shifting sorceress sets her eyes on Pos Staff of Wisdom, he suddenly realises hes going to need some help. Teaming up with a quick-witted corsac fox, he soon discovers that heroes can be found in the most unexpected places.

programme.title: The Wild Robot
programme.desc: Shipwrecked on a deserted island, a robot named Roz must learn to adapt to its new surroundings. Building relationships with the native animals, Roz soon develops a parental bond with an orphaned gosling.

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon
programme.desc: A young Viking with aspirations of becoming a dragon hunter befriends a young dragon himself and learns more about the creatures than he ever assumed.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Concerned that his half-human grandson isnt showing his vampire side, Dracula and his friends put the boy through a `monster-in-training boot camp just as Dracs old-school father decides to pay a visit.

programme.title: Teen Titans GO! to the Movies
programme.desc: With a few madcap ideas and a song in their hearts, the Teen Titans head to Hollywood to fulfill their dreams. Things soon go awry, however, when a supervillain plans to take over the planet, putting the very fate of the young heroes on the line.

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.desc: Otis the cow is a wild-living party animal and just loves to dance until dawn, but then his dad is killed by coyotes, and Otis has to become the responsible leader of the rest of the all-singing, all-dancing farm animals.

programme.title: The Inventor
programme.desc: The insatiably curious Leonardo da Vinci leaves Italy to join the French court, where he can experiment freely, invent incredible machines and study the human body. He is joined on his adventure by the audacious French princess Marguerite de Nevarre.

programme.title: The Swan Princess
programme.desc: A beautiful princess falls in love with a prince from another land, but an exiled magician who wants her for himself conjures up a spell to transform her into a swan. Forced to embark on a dangerous quest to reverse the magic, the princess is helped along by some new-found animal friends.

programme.title: The Nut Job
programme.desc: After he accidentally destroys the winter food supply of his fellow Liberty Park residents, Surly, a squirrel, is banished to the streets of Oakton. Luckily, Surly finds the towns nut shop and hatches a plan to plunder its bounty. However, unbeknown to Surly and his ragtag team of animal associates, the nut shop is really a front for mobsters who plan to rob the bank next door. While Surly and his team break in to the shop, the mobsters carry out their own scheme.

Forced to embark on a dangerous quest to reverse the magic, the princess is helped along by some new-found animal friends.

programme.title: Empire Waist
programme.desc: Lenore is a plus-sized teenager who gets forced into the spotlight when her classmate discovers her talent for fashion. However, the fears of her image-conscious mother and Lenores own insecurities prevent her from wearing her own designs.

programme.title: Finding Your Feet
programme.desc: A middle-class snob on the eve of retirement takes refuge with her bohemian sister after she discovers her husband is having an affair with her best friend.

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Newton Davis builds a dream home for his childhood sweetheart and is promptly dumped. Devastated, he seeks solace in the arms of a waitress, but sneaks off into the night once hes had his fun. The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newtons wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: The 40-Year-Old Virgin
programme.desc: Electronics store stock boy Andy Stitzer is horrified when he is found out as a virgin by his workmates - just when he thought he was becoming one of the gang. David, Jay and Cal surprise him by making it their mission to get him a girl and help him lose his virginity.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Two Weeks Notice
programme.desc: An ambitious law graduate decides to leave her job as she feels her skills are not appreciated by her boss, who basically treats her like his PA. However, he wont let her go that easily.

programme.title: The Tuxedo
programme.desc: An ordinary cabbie uses gadget-laden formal wear to combat a villain who wants to poison the worlds water supply.

programme.title: Anyone but You
programme.desc: Despite having an amazing first date, Bea and Bens initial attraction quickly turns sour. When they unexpectedly find themselves at a destination wedding in Australia, the pair pretend to be the perfect couple to keep up appearances.

programme.title: Youve Got Mail
programme.desc: Two rival bookstore owners are unaware that they are conducting a secret romance with each other on the Internet. When they discover the truth, they must prevent their business rivalry from interfering with their growing personal intimacy.

programme.title: Two Weeks Notice
programme.desc: An ambitious law graduate decides to leave her job as she feels her skills are not appreciated by her boss, who basically treats her like his PA. However, he wont let her go that easily.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect
programme.desc: When a new student joins her colleges female a cappella group, she takes the women out of their comfort zone of traditional pieces and introduces them to innovative arrangements.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Deeds is much-loved in his small town, but following the death of a long-lost uncle, who also happens to be a billionaire tycoon, Deeds inherits a fortune and heads for the big city to run his uncles company. When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever
programme.desc: A Brooklyn disco dancer develops doubts about his lifestyle when he teams up with an ambitious woman for a big contest.

programme.title: The Good Half
programme.desc: A man returns home to Cleveland for his mothers funeral, where he must confront his grief, reconnect with estranged family members, and forge new relationships.

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this film, set during World War II, tells the story of the all-female baseball league that was started while the American men were away fighting in Europe. After a team of potential players has been recruited, former player Jimmy Dugan coaches the girls and prepares them for the World Series.

programme.title: A Mistake
programme.desc: A surgeon allows her young colleague to take charge during a surgery. When a mistake occurs, the surgeon finds herself in a difficult situation.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: Germany advances into France, trapping Allied troops on the beaches of Dunkirk. Under air and ground cover from British and French forces, troops are slowly and methodically evacuated from the beach using every vessel that can be found.

programme.title: The Sons of Katie Elder
programme.desc: John Elder is the eldest of four brothers gathered to mourn and avenge the violent death of their mother, Katie Elder. An outlaw, he can only join his siblings in secret to fight back against the man who ordered her death and his hired guns.

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this film, set during World War II, tells the story of the all-female baseball league that was started while the American men were away fighting in Europe. After a team of potential players has been recruited, former player Jimmy Dugan coaches the girls and prepares them for the World Series.

programme.title: Valentines Day
programme.desc: Following a group of Los Angeles residents who try to find their way through the highs and lows of love during a single day.

programme.title: Black Dog
programme.desc: Released from jail, Lang returns to his hometown in Northwest China. As part of a dog patrol tasked with clearing stray dogs before the 2008 Olympics, he bonds with a black stray. The two lonely souls embark on a new journey together.

programme.title: Skincare
programme.desc: A famed aesthetician faces a new challenge when a rival opens a skin care boutique directly across from her store. Suspecting that someone is trying to sabotage her, she embarks on a quest to unravel the mystery of whos trying to destroy her life.

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: Roxy Hart is sent to prison for shooting her lying lover. In prison she meets tabloid darling and headline singer, Velma Kelly, who is also in for a double murder. With the help of a slick Chicago lawyer, she learns to play the media game and vies for the valuable press attention that will get her out of jail.

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: When Death arrives on Earth to take a media tycoon to Heaven, his experiences of life as a mortal lead to him falling in love with the doomed mans daughter. Taking the form of a mysterious stranger, Death strikes a deal with the business mogul which allows each of them to spend more time on Earth, but when Deaths handsome form attracts the attention of his victims daughter, the ensuing romance is complicated for all.

programme.title: The Tuxedo
programme.desc: An ordinary cabbie uses gadget-laden formal wear to combat a villain who wants to poison the worlds water supply.

programme.title: A.I.: Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: Futuristic version of the fairy tale `Pinocchio, about a highly advanced robotic child who longs to become a real boy so he can win back the love of his adoptive mother who abandoned him. He journeys through a violent, dystopian world in a quest for the Blue Fairy who has the power to make his dream come true.

programme.title: Robin and the Hoods
programme.desc: For the tenacious 11-year-old Robin and her loyal band of friends The Hoods, the patch of overgrown scrubland at the end of their cul-de-sac is a magical kingdom.

programme.title: The BFG
programme.desc: A 10-year-old girl, Queen Victoria and the Big Friendly Giant must devise a plan to get rid of Bloodbottler, Fleshlumpeater and all the other bad giants once and for all.

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Grown-up Peter Pan has to return to Neverland to rediscover his true identity in order to rescue his children from the clutches of the evil Captain Hook. Peter has grown up into a workaholic executive but takes time off for a holiday in London. Once there, his children are kidnapped by Hook, and Peter must throw off his corporate image and go back to Neverland to save his children.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncles creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncles secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them, which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: A.I.: Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: Futuristic version of the fairy tale `Pinocchio, about a highly advanced robotic child who longs to become a real boy so he can win back the love of his adoptive mother who abandoned him. He journeys through a violent, dystopian world in a quest for the Blue Fairy who has the power to make his dream come true.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Peter Rabbit and his three sisters -- Flopsy, Mopsy and Cotton-Tail -- enjoy spending their days in Mr. McGregors vegetable garden. When one of McGregors relatives suddenly moves in, hes less than thrilled to discover a family of rabbits in his new home. A battle of wills soon breaks out as the new owner hatches scheme after scheme to get rid of Peter -- a resourceful rabbit who proves to be a worthy and wily opponent.

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: In a parallel universe, young orphan Lyra Belacqua resides in Oxford under the patronage of her dashing adventurer Uncle, Lord Asriel. When Lyra comes into possession of an alethiometer, a compass that truthfully answers any question, there are people who will do anything to get hold of it, and Lyra finds herself on an epic quest to the frozen North to safeguard the future of her entire world.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Sherman is getting married to Denise Gains but his alter-ego Buddy Love keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts Buddys genes, but an accident and a dog hair see Buddy take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: The Tiger Rising
programme.desc: When a boy discovers a caged tiger in the woods near his home, his imagination runs wild as his life begins to change in unexpected ways.

programme.title: Robin and the Hoods
programme.desc: For the tenacious 11-year-old Robin and her loyal band of friends The Hoods, the patch of overgrown scrubland at the end of their cul-de-sac is a magical kingdom.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.desc: For the tenacious 11-year-old Robin and her loyal band of friends The Hoods, the patch of overgrown scrubland at the end of their cul-de-sac is a magical kingdom.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Midnight Run
programme.desc: A gruff cop turned bounty hunter captures a fugitive accountant accused of fraud and sets off from New York for Los Angeles to collect his prize. However, he is unaware that both the Mafia and the FBI are also on the accountants trail and hot on their heels.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: A group set out on safari into the heart of the Congo. Each have their different reasons for the trip, but nothing could have prepared them for the greatest danger - a troop of intelligent killer apes.

programme.title: Street Fighter
programme.desc: The cynical commander of Allied Nations forces has to prevent a warlord from taking over the world. With 63 hostages held in his seemingly impregnable fortress, the warlord is demanding an outrageously hefty ransom.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A kung fu expert is assigned to penetrate an island fortress to destroy an opium and white slavery empire.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Portraying the early years of the man of steel, from his birth on the planet Krypton to his arrival on Earth and the first of his epic battles with the arch-criminal Lex Luthor. The superhero must prevent Luthors nefarious scheme to rearrange the west coast of America with the help of a couple of nuclear bombs.

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: Having fallen in love with Lois, Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to be with her. His last act as a superhero has an unexpected side effect, when a bomb he hurls into space to save the Eiffel Tower accidentally releases the three villains trapped in the `Phantom Zone in the first `Superman movie. The super criminals set about conquering the Earth, while Clark sits helpless.

programme.title: Superman III
programme.desc: Clark Kents class reunion is disrupted when a villain forces a computer genius to help destroy Superman. Based on DC Comics characters.

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: World leaders want Superman to intervene in the arms race, but he is caught in a dilemma - having vowed never to interfere in history. He eventually agrees to destroy all nuclear weapons, but then comes face to face with the android Protean Man, Lex Luthors latest evil creation. Luthor wants to stoke up the arms race, and sees the android - made from Kryptonite - as the only way to stop Superman.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Epic tale in which an intrepid archaeologist tries to beat a band of Nazis to a unique religious relic which is central to their plans for world domination. Battling against a snake phobia and a vengeful ex-girlfriend, Indiana Jones is in constant peril, making hairs-breadth escapes at every turn in this celebration of the innocent adventure movies of an earlier era.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: Adventure sequel. Intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones, on the trail of fortune and glory in Old Shanghai, is ricocheted into a dangerous adventure in India. With his faithful companion Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott, Indie goes in search of the magical Sankara stone, and uncovers an ancient evil which threatens all who come into contact with it.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: The intrepid explorer Indiana Jones sets out to rescue his father, a medievalist who has vanished while searching for the Holy Grail. Following clues in the old mans notebook, Indy arrives in Venice, where he enlists the help of a beautiful academic, but they are not the only ones who are on the trail, and some sinister old enemies soon come out of the woodwork.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Professor Sherman, a 450lb scientist, falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters and - hey presto - he turns into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet, Buddy Love.

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: After disappearing for seven years, revolutionary spaceship Event Horizon is rediscovered. The team of scientists sent to investigate find that the entire crew is dead, and a terrifying, malevolent presence is lurking on board.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorise his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: As Mount Vesuvius rains down lava and ash, a gladiator (Kit Harington) races to save the woman (Emily Browning) he loves before the city collapses.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: Happy Gilmore is a bad boy ice hockey player who fails to make the grade because he cant skate or control his temper, but he does have a powerful shot and realises he can hit a golf ball 400 yards. When his grans house is repossessed because she never paid tax, he agrees to take up golf to try and win enough money to buy it back, but he cant putt and the golfing establishment arent happy to have him around.

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: Jamaican singer-songwriter Bob Marley overcomes adversity to become the most famous reggae musician in the world.

programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: Spoof spy caper with the eponymous, blundering hero attempting to recover the crown jewels and save Britain from an evil mastermind when all the other agents are killed. Promoted from lowly pen pusher to super spy, Johnny English is baffled when clues lead to respected entrepreneur Pascal Sauvage, but could the enigmatic Lorna hold the key to the mystery?

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: A haphazard spy returns to MI-7 after years in a Tibetan monastery honing his zen skills. Armed with gizmos, gadgets and chaotic luck he takes on a global ring of assassins.

programme.title: Mr Beans Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesnt go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: Bean: The Ultimate Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Mr Bean has somehow managed to get a job as a security guard. His latest assignment finds him travelling to America as an art expert, looking after the famous `Whistlers Mother painting as it is transported from Britain to a posh new Los Angeles museum. The catch is that Bean is no art expert and his trip was a ploy by his British employers to get rid of him. Unfortunately, no one has warned the Americans about Mr Bean.

programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.desc: Hard-drinking country music star Jackson Maine discovers, and falls in love with, a struggling but talented singer named Ally. As her career quickly takes off, Jackson starts to realize that his best days may be behind him.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: New student Cady Heron gets welcomed into the top of the social food chain by an elite group of popular girls called the Plastics, ruled by the conniving queen bee Regina George. However, when Cady makes the major misstep of falling for Reginas ex-boyfriend, she soon finds herself caught in their crosshairs.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Carl is in seventh heaven when he marries his gorgeous girlfriend Molly in Hawaii. After a blissful honeymoon, they get back to find best man Dupree jobless, penniless and homeless. When Carl offers him a place to crash, he has no idea of the havoc that the blonde bum is about to cause.

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever
programme.desc: A Brooklyn disco dancer develops doubts about his lifestyle when he teams up with an ambitious woman for a big contest.

programme.title: Weird Science
programme.desc: Two high-school nerds accidentally create the woman of their dreams when an electrical storm zaps their home computer.

programme.title: Please Dont Destroy: The Treasure of Foggy Mountain
programme.desc: Three deadbeat co-workers fend off hairless bears, desperate park rangers and a hypocritical cult leader while searching for a priceless treasure.

programme.title: Into the Wonderwoods
programme.desc: Ten-year-old Angelo, an aspiring explorer, is left behind by his distracted parents at a rest stop. He then ventures into a forest inhabited by strange, wonderful creatures to find them.

programme.title: Restless
programme.desc: A middle-aged empty nesters mundane life is upended when raucous new neighbours move in next door, unleashing potential danger and disruption.

programme.title: Spin the Bottle
programme.desc: When a group of friends play spin the bottle in a house marked by a brutal massacre, they unknowingly unleash an evil spirit and start dying in terrifying ways. The survivors must stick together to uncover the houses secrets and end the bloodshed.

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: A new bride is left under the care of friends when her husband travels to Transylvania for a meeting with Count Orlok. Plagued by horrific visions and an increasing sense of dread, she soon encounters an evil force thats far beyond her control.

programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A young man with amnesia bands together with a rugged survivalist after a devastating virus causes a zombie-like outbreak.
