programme.title: Rugrats in Paris: The Movie
programme.desc: The Rugrats are in Paris where Chuckies widowed father has been called on to mend an animated monster in a theme park, but its all a ploy by Coco LaBouche - the parks head, to get appointed head of a major company. As she and her henchman Jean-Claude plan to ensnare him, only the rest of the Rugrats can stop him falling for her charms.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Antiheroes
programme.desc: From Dirty Harry and The Godfather to the deeply imperfect gang from the Fast and the Furious franchise, this Cinema List celebrates our favourite anti-heroes.

programme.title: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Comic-book adventure about a stunt motorcyclist tricked into making a pact with Mephistopheles. The rider can only escape doing the demons bidding if he agrees to battle the dark lords son. To this end, he assumes the identity of the supernatural Ghost Rider, a terrifying night-time vigilante with a flaming skull.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: Though the Nazis fail to open the gates of Hell, one little devil gets through. Raised at a secret FBI lab, Hellboy is a cigar-chomping, crimson demon with a breezeblock for a right hand and a gift for fighting otherworldly beasts. Lively action fantasy based on the cult comic book.

programme.title: Snakes on a Plane
programme.desc: An FBI agent must contend with a swarm of deadly serpents that have been released aboard an airliner to kill the witness he is escorting to trial.

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: A car crash leaves a playboy maimed and charged with murder in this remake of the mind-bending film `Abre los Ojos.

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Eastern European visitor Viktor arrives in New York only to find that his papers are no longer valid. Rules being rules, airport chief Dixon cant let Viktor into America, or let him leave. Viktor has to survive by his wits, and slowly becomes the darling of the airport, as his sweet nature charms all who work there - except Dixon.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Dumped and depressed, English rose Iris agrees to swap homes with similarly unlucky in love Californian Amanda for a much-needed break. Iris finds herself in a palatial Hollywood mansion while Amanda navigates the lanes of a picture-perfect English village. Soon enough, both lovelorn ladies bump into local lads perfect for a romantic pick-me-up.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: In Tokyo shooting a whisky commercial, middle-aged actor Bob Harris becomes attracted to Charlotte, the young wife of a celebrity photographer. Together they ride out their boredom of hotel life and their bewilderment of the city.

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: Based on the botched mission during Americas military involvement in Somalia in the early 1990s. An attempt by US Army Rangers parachuted into Mogadishu to capture a warlords two top lieutenants goes disastrously wrong when two helicopters are shot down.

programme.title: Angels and Demons
programme.desc: Having ruffled the feathers of the Catholic Church with his controversial investigations into Christian history, Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon is surprised to be approached by the Popes emissaries for help. Following the Popes recent death, the four candidates most likely to take the pontiffs place have been kidnapped by a mysterious organisation known as the Illuminati.

programme.title: Angels and Demons
programme.desc: Having ruffled the feathers of the Catholic Church with his controversial investigations into Christian history, Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon is surprised to be approached by the Popes emissaries for help. Following the Popes recent death, the four candidates most likely to take the pontiffs place have been kidnapped by a mysterious organisation known as the Illuminati.

programme.title: Patriot Games
programme.desc: While visiting London with his family, Jack Ryan foils an IRA attempt to assassinate a government minister, killing one of the attackers in the process. Swearing vengeance, the IRAs Sean Miller follows Ryan and his family to their seaside home in America where he and his followers plan to exact their revenge.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: Gus Van Sants remake of the Hitchcock classic about an embezzler who checks into a remote motel run by a psychopath. While remaining faithful to the original, the modern setting and slightly more explicit shots than the censor would allow in Hitchcocks day make this a fascinating exercise that compares favourably to the original.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Juror #2
programme.desc: A juror for a high-profile murder trial finds himself struggling with a serious moral dilemma that could influence the verdict and potentially convict, or free, the accused killer.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: Classic chiller about the grisly goings-on in a remote motel run by a timid and decidedly odd young man and his domineering mother. The film totally changed Hollywoods perception of the horror genre and broke many of the movie industrys taboos.

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Over the course of a decade, a Midwestern motorcycle club evolves from a gathering place for local outsiders to a sinister gang, threatening the original groups way of life.

programme.title: Angels and Demons
programme.desc: Having ruffled the feathers of the Catholic Church with his controversial investigations into Christian history, Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon is surprised to be approached by the Popes emissaries for help. Following the Popes recent death, the four candidates most likely to take the pontiffs place have been kidnapped by a mysterious organisation known as the Illuminati.

programme.title: Juror #2
programme.desc: A juror for a high-profile murder trial finds himself struggling with a serious moral dilemma that could influence the verdict and potentially convict, or free, the accused killer.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: After a long day, LA taxi driver Max is about to knock off when sharp-suited Vincent offers him $600 to make five stops. Sounds good until Vincent turns out to be a merciless hitman and each one of those stops involves a hit. As the night goes on, Max starts to wonder if hell live to see the sunrise, as the pair are hunted by the police and the FBI.

programme.title: Patriot Games
programme.desc: While visiting London with his family, Jack Ryan foils an IRA attempt to assassinate a government minister, killing one of the attackers in the process. Swearing vengeance, the IRAs Sean Miller follows Ryan and his family to their seaside home in America where he and his followers plan to exact their revenge.

programme.title: The Equalizer 2
programme.desc: Robert McCalls mysterious past cuts especially close to home when thugs kill Susan Plummer, his best friend and former colleague. Now out for revenge, McCall must take on a crew of highly trained assassins who will stop at nothing to destroy him.

programme.title: Crank
programme.desc: An ex-hit man is injected with a mysterious cocktail of drugs by his arch-rival that will kill him if his heart rate drops below a certain level. Hurtling through a succession of sex and violence in order to keep his pulse rate up, he must seek revenge and keep himself and his girlfriend alive.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a bootlegging gang is threatened by a new deputy and other authorities who want a cut of their profits.

programme.title: Sew Torn
programme.desc: A seamstress gets tangled in her own thread after stealing a briefcase from a drug deal gone bad. In an escalating game of cat and mouse, her different choices lead to drastically different outcomes along the way.

programme.title: Death Of A Showjumper
programme.desc: Secrets and Silence: When talented show jumper Katie Simpson dies, those close to her believe shes been murdered. With themes of domestic violence and suicide.

The Girl Who Caught A Killer
1972: Munichs Black September
programme.desc: Reconstructing the events leading up to the Munich Olympic massacre on September 5, 1972, from the viewpoints of the victims, the police, and the assassins.

programme.title: Forced Out
programme.desc: Sky Original documentary telling the story of the men and women discharged from the UK Armed Forces, simply for being homosexual, who fought to overturn the gay ban.

programme.title: Man on Wire
programme.desc: On August 7th 1974, at 7.15am, 24-year-old Frenchman Philippe Petit stepped off the edge of the South Tower of New Yorks World Trade Centre. Armed only with a balancing pole and intense determination, he walked out onto a single suspended wire and `danced for 45 minutes while balancing a quarter of a mile above the pavement below. The is the intimate story of Petit and his group of friends as they followed their dream.

programme.title: The Last Movie Stars
programme.sub-title: Chapter Six: Luck Is an Art
programme.desc: In the wake of their sons death, Joanne enters a career renaissance while Paul dives deeper into the high-stakes world of car racing; the couple find solace in charitable work through their company Newmans Own and enter their twilight years.

programme.title: Barclays Premier League Legends
programme.desc: A profile of former Liverpool player Jamie Carragher. The defender spent his whole senior career at Anfield, winning numerous trophies including the 2005 UEFA Champions League.

programme.desc: The captivating story of Luther Vandross, from his early Sesame Street appearances to becoming the indisputable master of the love song. Using rare archives, Vandross shares his own story with insights from his closest collaborators.

programme.title: Death Of A Showjumper
programme.desc: Secrets and Silence: When talented show jumper Katie Simpson dies, those close to her believe shes been murdered. With themes of domestic violence and suicide.

programme.title: The Girl Who Caught A Killer
The Girl Who Caught A Killer
1972: Munichs Black September
programme.desc: Reconstructing the events leading up to the Munich Olympic massacre on September 5, 1972, from the viewpoints of the victims, the police, and the assassins.

programme.title: Forced Out
programme.desc: Sky Original documentary telling the story of the men and women discharged from the UK Armed Forces, simply for being homosexual, who fought to overturn the gay ban.

programme.title: Man on Wire
programme.desc: On August 7th 1974, at 7.15am, 24-year-old Frenchman Philippe Petit stepped off the edge of the South Tower of New Yorks World Trade Centre. Armed only with a balancing pole and intense determination, he walked out onto a single suspended wire and `danced for 45 minutes while balancing a quarter of a mile above the pavement below. The is the intimate story of Petit and his group of friends as they followed their dream.

programme.title: The Last Movie Stars
programme.sub-title: Chapter Six: Luck Is an Art
programme.desc: In the wake of their sons death, Joanne enters a career renaissance while Paul dives deeper into the high-stakes world of car racing; the couple find solace in charitable work through their company Newmans Own and enter their twilight years.

programme.title: Barclays Premier League Legends
programme.desc: A profile of former Liverpool player Jamie Carragher. The defender spent his whole senior career at Anfield, winning numerous trophies including the 2005 UEFA Champions League.

programme.title: The Directors
programme.desc: The story of Academy Award-winning director Spike Lee, who wowed audiences with gripping films like `Malcolm X, `Inside Man and `BlacKkKlansman.

programme.title: The Eighties
programme.desc: A look at how Mikhail Gorbachevs rise to power ignited an astounding chain of events that culminated in the dramatic conclusion of the Cold War.

programme.title: The Jinx: The Life and Deaths of Robert Durst
programme.sub-title: Chapter 1: A Body in the Bay
programme.desc: In 2001, a dismembered corpse is found floating in Galveston Bay, Texas, and police arrest Robert Durst for the murder of his neighbour; in 2012, Durst reaches out to filmmakers Andrew Jarecki and Marc Smerling and agrees to be interviewed.

programme.title: The Jinx: The Life and Deaths of Robert Durst
programme.desc: Durst reveals details about his childhood, including witnessing his mothers suicide, and recalls how he was pressured to join his fathers business; in 1982, Robert makes a report to police that his wife has gone missing.

programme.title: Jealous Guy: The Assassination Of John Lennon
programme.desc: An exploration of the life and career of the Beatles superstar, with a look at the strange parallels between him and his killer Mark David Chapman.

programme.title: My Icon

programme.title: Barbie Uncovered
programme.desc: Explore the unknown creation story behind Barbie, one of the worlds most iconic brands, with an in-depth look at the fascinating stories of her parents - Ruth Handler and Jack Ryan.

programme.title: My Icon

programme.title: Discovering Film

programme.title: Twist Of Faith: America Undercover
programme.desc: A look at the sexual abuse in the Roman Catholic Church and focuses on the life of Ohio fireman Tony Comes, who was abused by a priest at the age of 14. Having long buried the secrets of his past, Comes decides to take action when stories start surfacing in the media about other boys victimised by priests. As Comes, who now has a wife and two children, decides to prosecute Dennis Gray, the priest who sodomized him, he must face his community and confront his belief in God.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild
programme.desc: The Lake Erie Watersnake is currently on the brink of extinction, and researchers have been fighting to get it back. And it looks like its finally working - thanks to the round goby. Grad student Lizzy Mack is heading out on day trips to catch bucket loads of the snakes, collect measurements, and inject them with small microchips to track them along their way, all while dodging bites from some of the crankiest snakes around.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild
programme.desc: Where animals and humans co-exist, how do you stop a bad reputation from pushing a species towards extinction? From Rattlesnakes to Cormorants, see how creatures that have bad reputations are bring dealt with when it comes to conservation.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild
programme.desc: With seven of Ontarios eight turtle species listed as endangered, the push is on to keep population numbers up. But turtles are slow and not entirely smart, which means they keep taking a beating from predators, and from cars.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild
programme.desc: A dam is an engineering feat, controlling massive amounts of water. But it can also wreak havoc on the animals that call those waters home.

programme.desc: Epic flights, adventurous sea journeys, and exhausting road trips all play a key part in the lives of many species. These empires travel in search of food, shelter, or a mate.

programme.title: Coral City
programme.desc: Adapt or perish in the coral streets as higher-than-normal temperatures make autumn cooling (and survival) more difficult. Shack up with a clownfish family and their sea anemone landlord, then see cleaner fish give manta rays a day at the spa.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas
programme.desc: North of the worlds largest freshwater lake lies some of the worlds fiercest terrain: from the rugged ancient landscape of the Canadian Shield and northern forests to stunning vistas of Lake Superior.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild
programme.desc: Since the 1900s, this uninhabited island in Lake Superior has been a constant battleground between moose and wolves. Scientists have been watching closely since 1953, making it one of the oldest research projects in the country.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild
programme.desc: As far as invasive species go, Asian carp are some of the nastiest invaders around. Theyve thus far made their way up Americas waterways, snaking up the Illinois river, eating voraciously, breeding quickly, and decimating native fish populations.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild
programme.desc: The Lake Erie Watersnake is currently on the brink of extinction, and researchers have been fighting to get it back. And it looks like its finally working - thanks to the round goby. Grad student Lizzy Mack is heading out on day trips to catch bucket loads of the snakes, collect measurements, and inject them with small microchips to track them along their way, all while dodging bites from some of the crankiest snakes around.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild
programme.desc: Where animals and humans co-exist, how do you stop a bad reputation from pushing a species towards extinction? From Rattlesnakes to Cormorants, see how creatures that have bad reputations are bring dealt with when it comes to conservation.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild
programme.desc: With seven of Ontarios eight turtle species listed as endangered, the push is on to keep population numbers up. But turtles are slow and not entirely smart, which means they keep taking a beating from predators, and from cars.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild
programme.desc: A dam is an engineering feat, controlling massive amounts of water. But it can also wreak havoc on the animals that call those waters home.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild
programme.desc: Flying squirrels leaping through the air is quite a sight, especially for researchers who know they are not supposed to be there. The southern flying squirrel are typically found along the shores of Lake Erie.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild
programme.desc: Sometimes animals get a second chance. Such as the majestic elk, who went extinct in Ontario thanks to habitat loss and overaggressive hunting.

programme.title: Extreme Africa
programme.desc: The Southern Drylands is a journey into the most arid and extreme environments in the furthest reaches of southern Africa. Spectacular but treacherous places where almost no rain falls with incredibly resilient creatures.

programme.title: Extreme Africa
programme.desc: Etosha was once a great lake that dried up and now only fills with water seasonally during the summer rains. Once the Etosha pan is full of water, a myriad of water birds congregate in the shallow lake to breed, most notably Greater and lesser flamingos.

programme.title: Extreme Africa
programme.desc: The course of South Africas Orange river from its origins to where it spills out into the Atlantic Ocean. Along the way a diverse range of habitats and the creatures they support, from the dry lands of the Richtersveld to the beauty of Augrabies, this is the story of the Linear Oasis. A look at how life is adapted to survive along its course and discover a rich world of plants and animals.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue
programme.desc: The medical team check on a turkey vulture with an injured shoulder. However, the team has a hard time getting him into the X-ray.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue
programme.desc: A mother rabbit is brought into the Wildlife Centre with a baby, but the baby is not hers. The team is worried that the baby might be in danger if they leave it in her crate. Baby squirrels appear en masse as fall begins.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue
programme.desc: A group of orphaned squirrel babies storm the Wildlife Centre. The vets take care of a young wounded vulture that may be kept in the observation all winter. The team tries to catch a rogue coyote.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue
programme.desc: Nathalie searches for a new home for the centre, while the team cares for a turkey vulture.

programme.title: Worlds Most Toxic Animals
programme.desc: In Australia, meet the worlds most venomous snake. Plus, in nearby oceans, discover the deadly nature the marine creatures that share these tropical waters.

programme.title: Worlds Most Toxic Animals
programme.desc: In the South American rainforest, theres a tiny frog thats packed with poison. While near Sydney, Australia, youll meet the worlds most venomous spider.

programme.title: The Great Elephant Tale
programme.desc: A calf navigates the Okavango Delta; a Bull searches for a mate; and a Matriarch leads her family through the desert. These individual adventures combine to tell the story of Africas most iconic species.

programme.title: Coral City
programme.desc: Adapt or perish in the coral streets as higher-than-normal temperatures make autumn cooling (and survival) more difficult. Shack up with a clownfish family and their sea anemone landlord, then see cleaner fish give manta rays a day at the spa.

programme.title: Deep Dive North America
programme.desc: Marvel at North Americas natural wonders as Lizzie swims through astonishing coral reefs, excavates ancient fossils, and treks through jungles on tropical shores. Observe jaguars prowling a Costa Rican beach and encounter the largest sharks.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Conquest of the Skies
programme.desc: In the final episode in the series, Sir David Attenborough turns his attention to the creatures that dominate our skies today.

programme.title: Attenborough At 90: Behind the Lens
programme.desc: In celebration of Sir David Attenboroughs 90th Birthday, this intimate film presents new interviews, eye-opening behind-the-scenes footage and extraordinary clips from some of his most recent films.

programme.title: Evolution Earth
programme.desc: Animals go to extraordinary lengths to survive in the hottest and driest extremes, from the Sahara Desert to Australia.

programme.title: Evolution Earth
programme.desc: Polar bears in the Arctic, penguins in Antarctica and other animals on icy islands can reveal changes taking place at the planets frozen extremes.

programme.title: Animals Decoded

programme.title: Medical Detectives

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: The body of a 24-year-old criminology student is found wrapped in a blanket alongside a desolate road in Brooklyn, N.Y.; police discover that the bouncer at a bar is her killer.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a 79-year-old woman is found shot to death in her home, investigators initially suspect her husband or a violent neighbour; shell casings recovered at the scene and a high-tech database reveal an unlikely killer.

programme.sub-title: Vandalism Excuse at Its Finest?!; Amazing Townhouse Profit?!

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Big Bucks Fish Tank Botch?!; Lovers Lexus Mix-Up!
programme.desc: A custom fish tank arrives at its destination damaged. Plus, a man claims that his ex-lover fraudulently registered his car under her name.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Hair Stylist Left in the Dark?!; Solar Tree Trimming Disaster?!

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Woman Desperate for Degrading Job?!; The Infamous Afghanistan Scam?!
programme.desc: A generous friend steps in when a woman claims that she is willing to work as a paid escort to cover her overdue bills. A woman sends money to a man she has never met in person who says that he is trapped in Afghanistan.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Sister Love Gone Wrong!; Who Stole My Clarinet?
programme.desc: An ongoing feud involving bad credit and an expensive car divides sisters, and an unassuming friend gets involved. As ex-friends fight over a botched move, a clarinet, missing underwear and swim trunks come into play.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Paraplegics Dying Wishes Ignored?!; Mommy Stole My School Money!
programme.desc: A man saves money in a safe to be given to his roommate after he dies, and his sisters opening of it is called into question. A mother admits to taking her 19-year-old sons financial aid check and used it to cover household expenses.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Wheres My Harley Money?!; Choose a Defense ... Any Defense!; Moped Spill!
programme.desc: A woman claims her friend robbed her of $8000 when she asked him to sell her motorcycle. A man on a moped says he was hit by a car.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Maced in the Face!; Divorced and Still Fighting!

programme.title: Judge Judy

programme.title: Judge Judy

programme.title: Beyond Paradise
programme.desc: A fishing trawler heads out to sea with three brothers and their ailing stepmother aboard. When it returns to Shipton Abbott harbour several hours later, only the three fishermen remain. A note found on deck suggests the woman took her own life. As her estranged daughter comes to town to help make funeral arrangements, the simple case grows more complex. Meanwhile, its the day of the house visit, but its no plain sailing for Humphrey and Martha.

programme.title: Beyond Paradise
programme.desc: When a priest from a Catholic boarding school suddenly disappears, Humphrey and Esther find that his case has uncanny similarities to a local myth - The Devil on the Rocks. Why was he last seen marching on a nearby beach in the middle of a dense fog, and where is he now? With the schools headmistress reluctant to aid the investigation, a large sum of money missing from the school safe, and the priest nowhere to be found, the team have their work cut out trying to pin down the truth.

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses...
programme.desc: Rodney gets an unexpected windfall and decides to take Cassandra on the holiday of a lifetime in Miami, unaware that the non-refundable tickets are for the day of her banks seminar in Eastbourne. In a show of brotherly love, Del naturally offers to accompany Rodders, and so they bid farewell to Peckham and embark on a holiday they are likely never to forget.

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses...
programme.sub-title: Miami Twice: Oh, to Be in England
programme.desc: With Del handling the accommodation and transport for their weeks holiday in America, its not surprising that he and Rodney end up in a dodgy camper-van. Things get even worse when the van disappears while they are in a nightclub.

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses...
programme.desc: Things are moving on for the Trotter family as Del is now a dad, and Rodney is back with Cassandra. However, Del is down in the yuletide dumps with money problems, and Rodders worries his `bruv has lost his drive.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo follows his 1930s Bradshaws guide to the unspoilt East Sussex Cinque Port of Rye. On the windswept harbour beach, he hears how, in 1928, a generation of lifeboatmen lost their lives in a tragic rescue attempt at sea.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael heads to the splendid Walmer Castle, home during the 1920s to Lord Beauchamp. Michaels guide, the founder of the LGBTQ working group for English Heritage, tells Michael of the lavish homosexual parties Lord Beauchamp held at the castle.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.sub-title: Herne Bay to Leeds Castle, Kent
programme.desc: Michael reaches the Kent seaside resort of Herne Bay, where he learns about a pioneering aviatrix who began her working life as a typist in Hull but whose epic achievements made her an international celebrity.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael continues his journeys in greater London. Beginning on its southeastern fringe in the leafy and historic village of Chislehurst, Michael finds surprising imperial connections and a dark labyrinth beneath.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: The team take on a modern day fast Ford to see if a quick flip could make a few quid and revisit a 3 year MG restoration project thats still not finished.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: A 90s Alfa with electrical issues lives up to its stereotype and the team revisit a road roller, four years on. They also tackle a French motoring icon, the Citroen 2CV6 Dolly.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Paul and Charlie head south for an immaculate Lotus Super 7. Derek and Jack are in Sheffield collecting a 1929 Riley Monaco and a 1924 Alvis 12/50 tourer.

programme.title: Flipping Bangers
programme.desc: Will Trickett and Gus Gregory hunt for neglected cars they can fix and flip for a profit. Any losses incurred by their flipping come out of their own pockets.

programme.title: The Blue Planet
programme.desc: Studying the seasonal changes in the richest waters on Earth, where the annual cycle of the Sun drives an explosion of life, reveals an extraordinary variety of marine animals including seals, dolphins, jellyfish and the bizarre walking handfish.

programme.title: The Blue Planet
programme.desc: The fragile ecosystems that have grown around the worlds coral reefs. The reefs take hundreds of years to develop and are adorned with spectacularly colourful life. However, this is not always an idyllic tropical paradise - one big storm can threaten the entire community.

programme.title: The Blue Planet
programme.desc: How do the tides affect marine life? Find out with the giant stingrays that glide on currents, the snails that surf the waves in pursuit of a meal, and the dolphins that play a deadly game of catch.

programme.title: The Blue Planet
programme.desc: David Attenborough explains how animals from in and around the sea manage to make use of the constantly changing areas where land meets water. Spectacular mass turtle egg-layings, which take place in the same location over just a few days each year, and killer whales hunting seal pups are among the unforgettable visual highlights.

programme.title: Wilderness with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Simon Reeve voyages across the Coral Triangle, a huge wilderness of tropical seas and islands. Surrounded by the Philippines, Malaysia and Indonesia, the Coral Triangle is one of the most beautiful corners of the oceans.

programme.desc: The team purchase a 1950s Austin Westminster rally car in the hope that seasoned competitor Dave Mathewson can win a race.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: A super rare Reliant Scimitar GTC undergoes an expert recommission, leaving no bolt unturned. And a Honda CBR superbike from the 80s is in need of repair.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
